member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder2.AddFont
member.summary: Adds a font to the set being built, with the caller supplying enough information to search on and determine axis ranges, avoiding the need to open the potentially non-local font.
member.param: Font file reference object to add to the set.
The zero-based index of a font face in a collection.
Font face simulation flags for algorithmic emboldening and italicization.
A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.
The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.
List of properties to associate with the reference.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder2.AddFontFile
member.summary: Adds references to all the fonts in the specified font file. The method parses the font file to determine the fonts and their properties.
member.param: Absolute file path to add to the font set.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Contains methods for building a font set.
